item.A:
běi
北京 Běijīng Beijing; capital of People's Republic of China; one of the four municipalities 直轄市|直辖市

měi
美国 (美國) Měiguó America; American; United States of America; USA

item.Q:
Write the character:
general; popular; everywhere; universal
item.A:
pǔ
普遍 pǔbiàn universal; general; widespread; commonplace

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: big; huge; large; major; great; wide; deep; oldest; eldest
2: doctor
item.A:
1: dà 2: dài

item.Q:
Write the character:
multitude; abbr. for 眾議院|众议院 House of Representatives
item.A:
traditional: 眾
zhòng
群众 (群眾) qúnzhòng the masses

item.Q:

to make into; to change into; -ization; to ... -ize; to transform; abbr. for chemistry 化学
item.A:
huà

traditional: 麥
mài

qiān

wàn
